title: Shane Hawkins Hitting Road with Chevy Metal for 2025 Summer Tour
description: The covers band was founded by his late father, Foo Fighters drummer Taylor Hawkins, in 2013. Shane Hawkins Hitting Road with Chevy Metal for 2025 Summer Tour Spencer Kaufman
author: Spencer Kaufman
excerpt: Shane Hawkins, the son of late Foo Fighters drummer Taylor Hawkins, is hitting the road with Chevy Metal for a 2025 summer tour.
text: Shane Hawkins, the son of late Foo Fighters drummer Taylor Hawkins, is set to tour this summer with Chevy Metal, the covers band that his father formed back in 2013. The US tour kicks off at Denver’s Marquis on July 19th and will also include stops at New York’s Gramercy Theater, Philadelphia’s The Foundry, and The Atlantis in Washington, DC. See the full list of dates below. Tickets for Chevy Metal’s 2025 tour go on sale to the general public on Friday, May 23rd at 9:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. There will also be a Live Nation pre-sale for select dates (use code FREESTYLE) beginning on Wednesday, May 21st at 9:00 a.m. local time. Before Taylor Hawkins’ passing in 2022, he would routinely tour with Chevy Metal. Shane Hawkins previously sat behind the kit at a few of the outfit’s gigs in 2023 and also joined them on tour in 2024. Chevy Metal 2025 Tour Dates: 07/19 – Denver, CO @ Marquis 07/20 – Aspen, CO @ Belly Up 07/23 – Allston, MA @ Brighton Music Hall 07/24 – New York, NY @ Gramercy Theater 07/25 – Philadelphia, PA @ The Foundry 07/26 – Washington, DC @ The Atlantis 08/09 – Long Beach, CA @ Alex’s Bar 08/31 – Agoura Hills, CA @ Canyon Club
html:
Shane Hawkins, the son of late Foo Fighters drummer Taylor Hawkins, is set to tour this summer with Chevy Metal, the covers band that his father formed back in 2013.

The US tour kicks off at Denver’s Marquis on July 19th and will also include stops at New York’s Gramercy Theater, Philadelphia’s The Foundry, and The Atlantis in Washington, DC. See the full list of dates below.

Tickets for Chevy Metal’s 2025 tour go on sale to the general public on Friday, May 23rd at 9:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. There will also be a Live Nation pre-sale for select dates (use code FREESTYLE) beginning on Wednesday, May 21st at 9:00 a.m. local time.

Before Taylor Hawkins’ passing in 2022, he would routinely tour with Chevy Metal. Shane Hawkins previously sat behind the kit at a few of the outfit’s gigs in 2023 and also joined them on tour in 2024.

Chevy Metal 2025 Tour Dates:
07/19 – Denver, CO @ Marquis
07/20 – Aspen, CO @ Belly Up
07/23 – Allston, MA @ Brighton Music Hall
07/24 – New York, NY @ Gramercy Theater
07/25 – Philadelphia, PA @ The Foundry
07/26 – Washington, DC @ The Atlantis
08/09 – Long Beach, CA @ Alex’s Bar
08/31 – Agoura Hills, CA @ Canyon Club
